snippet.title: A f(e)rmidable family Une famille f(e)rmidable
snippet.description: A f(e)rmidable family Une famille f(e)rmidable / Anaïs Schaeffer At the beginning of October, Olivia Fermi, granddaughter of Physics Nobel prize-winner Enrico Fermi, stopped off at CERN on the second stage of her "nuclear pilgrimage", using the opportunity to meet CERN physicists…whom she compared to rare, exotic birds. Olivia Fermi, photographed outside the Globe of Science and Innovation while visiting the Organization [...] BUL-NA-2011-270.- 2011 \- Published in : CERN Bulletin 43/2011 44/2011 Fulltext: OFermi 05-6371_image \- JPEG; OFermi 05-7181_image \- JPEG;

snippet.description: The collaboration between Korteweg and de Vries -- An enquiry into personalities / Willink, Bastiaan In the course of the years the names of Korteweg and de Vries have come to be closely associated. [...] arXiv:0710.5227. \- 2007\. - 16 p. Full text
